template.subject: [WARNING] High Latency Detected in Payment API
template.content:
Alert Title: High Latency Detected in Payment API
Alert Description: Payment API latency has exceeded the warning threshold of 500ms. Current average response time: 735ms
Alert Type: Performance Degradation
Severity: Warning
System: Payment Processing
Affected Service: Payment API Gateway
Detected: 03/15/2025 08:20:12 am
Notification: 03/15/2025 08:23:45 am
Transaction Volume: 124/min
Error Rate: 0%
Impact: Potential delays in payment processing
SLA Status: At Risk (99.92% current)
Contact: payment-team@acme.com
Dashboard: https://monitoring.acme.com/dashboards/payment-api
Alert ID: perf_warn_7395
Version: 2.4.1
